response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's important to extend this offer with utmost respect and fairness. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects the significant investment we've made into developing this product, while also allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between our interests and your perceived value of the product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
